ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: Supplementary Appendix 1
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: Supplementary material, Appendix 1. Table 1, rough data with the stage of tooth eruption of living marsupials and extinct stem taxa. Table 2, reduced data with 76 specimens. Table 3, ranking of tooth eruption sumarized per genera. Table 4, sequence of tooth eruption per genera used in the event-pairing analysis.
